author: ryanleeschneider
content: If thats the case, and the method is already being renamed to `eth_simulateV1` maybe this would be a good time to break it up into two different RPCs (e.g. something like `eth_callManyV2` which focuses on the non-validating path  and `eth_simulateV1` which always validates)?

author: sky.cactus
content: The main argument against `call` is that this lets you simulate more than just "contract calls".  It lets you simulate blocks and (in theory) any different type of transaction (like blob transactions, withdraws, etc.)
